00284 The above function should maybe return an iterator (as there may be many
00285 matching proxies)

00291 --------------

00296     tmrm_proxy* key);

00299  * for it.
00300  *
00301  * Notation: "PROXY /"
00302  *

00304  * => tmrm_multiset* tmrm_subject_map_keys_by_value(tmrm_object* object)
00305  * PHP-prototype: TMRM_SubjectMap::keysByValue()
00306 Internal function:
00307 TODO: Maybe tmrm_proxy_new_from_id(...) => Yes!
00308 tmrm_proxy* tmrm_proxy_init_from_id(tmrm_subject_map* map, int id);
00309 
00310 TODO: Do we need this function?
00311 Internal function:
00312  * Creates a hash value that represents the proxy including
00313  * its properties in a way that proxies with equal properties
00314  * always hav the same hash value. The label is not taken
00315  * into account.

00317 
00318  * PHP-prototype: TMRM_Proxy::setLabel()

00321  * PHP-prototype: TMRM_Proxy::getSubjectMap()

00326                                   tmrm_proxy* value);
00327    int tmrm_proxy_remove_property_literal(tmrm_proxy* p, tmrm_proxy* key,
